description:
CLUE is the classic mystery game - a grand mansion … a dastardly murder … a gathering of suspicious characters. Now you can play the beloved Hasbro family board game on Nintendo Switch™!

WHO, with WHAT weapon and WHERE?

CHOOSE YOUR CHARACTER 
Gather up to 6 players and become Miss Scarlett, Colonel Mustard, Doctor Orchid, Reverend Green, Mrs. Peacock or Professor Plum.

LAUNCH YOUR INVESTIGATION 
Ask questions and gather answers from your fellow suspects. Your in-game clue sheet will record your discoveries while you note your suspicions.

MAKE YOUR ACCUSATION 
You must be on the scene of the crime to make your accusation. Roll the dice, get to the correct room and unravel the mystery!

UP-TO 6 PLAYERS 
Join friends and family offline and online, challenge AI characters, or gather friends and AIs in a single game.

DISCOVER NEW MYSTERIES
Become the best detective in Hollywood. Solve the mystery of Snowy Peaks. Be a sparkling suspect at the Venetian Masquerade. Question Sherifs in the Wild West! Each theme comes with new characters, weapons and locations to explore.

UNLOCK THE  ULTIMATE DETECTIVE'S PACKAGE
Solve mysteries in 5 MORE themes that transform the suspects, weapons and locations! Become the Great Detective himself and play as Sherlock Holmes. Catch criminals from the Vampire Castle to an Egyptian dig site and beyond!
name: Clue: The Ultimate Detective’s Package
